name: kruegge82/dhl-authentication-oauth-api
description:
This API describes how API client can obtain a token which is used to access various Parcel Germany APIs. Using this API is often the first step in making your API call.

Preconditions

You will need: * client ID (aka "API Key", obtained when you create an app in developer.dhl.com) * client secret (obtained when you create an app in developer.dhl.com) * GKP user name (obtained when setting up your business account with Parcel Germany) * GKP password (obtained when setting up your business account with Parcel Germany)

Technical Information

This uses an implementation of OAuth2 Password Grant (RFC 6749). After successfull usage you will: * have an opaque access token to be used for API calls afterwards * this token will have an expiration time
